TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CompilationSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class CompilationSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 定義用來支援 Web 應用程式編譯基礎結構的組態設定。

span.span: Defines configuration settings that are used to support the compilation infrastructure of Web applications.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一個方式來以程式設計方式存取和修改的內容`compilation`組態檔區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the `compilation` section of the configuration file. ## Examples 此範例示範如何指定以宣告方式的多個屬性的值`compilation`區段中，也可存取隸屬類別。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `compilation` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下列組態檔範例示範如何以宣告方式為指定的值`compilation`一節。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `compilation` section. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用成員類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use members of the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/CS/CompilationSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/VB/CompilationSection.vb#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Compilation Model
ASP.NET Precompilation Overview

summary.span: 使用預設值初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 您可以取得的執行個體類別使用方法。You can obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Assemblies As AssemblyCollection

summary.span: 取得 的 。

span.span: Gets the of the .

value.span: ，包含在編譯 ASP.NET 資源時所使用組件物件。

span.span: A that contains the assembly objects used during compilation of an ASP.NET resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性包含動態 ASP.NET 資源編譯期間要使用的組件參考。This property contains the assembly references to use during compilation of a dynamic ASP.NET resource. 編譯程式碼中的每個模組時，ASP.NET 會將這些組件會自動連結至資源。ASP.NET automatically links these assemblies to the resource when compiling each code module.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定組件的後續處理編譯步驟。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying a post-process compilation step for an assembly.

value.span: 指定組件後續處理編譯步驟的字串值。

span.span: A string value specifying the post-process compilation step for an assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Batch { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Batch : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否嘗試批次編譯。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether batch compilation is attempted.

value.span: 如果嘗試批次編譯，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if batch compilation is attempted; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`變更存取未編譯的檔案時，需要編譯所造成的延遲。Set this attribute to `true` to change the delay caused by the required compilation when you access an uncompiled file. 將此屬性設定為`true`指示 ASP.NET 先行編譯批次模式中的所有未編譯的檔案。Setting this attribute to `true` instructs ASP.NET to precompile all the uncompiled files in batch mode. 第一次編譯的檔案; 時，就會發生延遲不過一旦檔案會進行編譯，延遲也會刪除。A delay occurs when the files are first compiled; however once the files are compiled, the delay is eliminated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/CS/CompilationSection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/VB/CompilationSection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan BatchTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.BatchTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定批次編譯的逾時期間，以秒為單位。

span.span: Gets or sets the time-out period, in seconds, for batch compilation.

value.span: 值，表示授與批次編譯發生的時間長度 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: A value indicating the amount of time in seconds granted for batch compilation to occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示逾時期間 （秒），批次編譯。Indicates the time-out period, in seconds, for batch compilation. 如果編譯無法在逾時期限內完成，編譯器會還原為目前頁面的單一編譯模式。If the compilation cannot be completed within the time-out period, the compiler reverts to single-compilation mode for the current page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/CS/CompilationSection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/VB/CompilationSection.vb#5)]

member this.DefaultLanguage : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在動態編譯檔案使用的預設程式設計語言。

span.span: Gets or sets the default programming language to use in dynamic-compilation files.

value.span: 值，指定在動態編譯檔案使用的預設程式設計語言。

span.span: A value specifying the default programming language to use in dynamic-compilation files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的預設程式設計語言，例如 C# 或 VB.NET，在動態編譯檔案中使用。Specifies the default programming language, such as C# or VB.NET, to use in dynamic compilation files. 語言名稱會定義使用`system.codedom`一節。Language names are defined using the `system.codedom` section. 預設程式設計語言是`vb`，VB.NET 指定為預設的程式設計語言。The default programming language is `vb`, which specifies VB.NET as the default programming language. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 ASP.NET 應用程式是否可以利用 [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] 預先擷取功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an ASP.NET application can take advantage of [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] prefetch functionality.

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 應用程式可以利用 [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] 預先擷取功能，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if an ASP.NET application can take advantage of [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] prefetch functionality; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預先擷取是一個公用程式，要改善應用程式啟動效能的應用程式資料載入記憶體，然後再要求它。Prefetch is a utility that is intended to improve application startup performance by loading application data into memory before it is demanded . > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]預先擷取服務必須設定並執行這項設定才能生效。The [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] prefetch service must be configured and running for this setting to be effective.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否使用 Microsoft Visual Basic 編譯選項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the Microsoft Visual Basic compile option.

value.span: 如果啟用 Visual Basic 編譯選項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the Visual Basic compile option is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 指定停用 Visual Basic 編譯選項。

value.span: 預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指定設定的 Microsoft Visual Basic`explicit`編譯選項。This property specifies the setting of the Microsoft Visual Basic `explicit` compile option. 當設定為`true`，Visual Basic`explicit`編譯選項已啟用。When set to `true`, the Visual Basic `explicit` compile option is enabled. 啟用此選項時，所有的變數必須明確地使用宣告`Dim`， `Private`， `Public`，或`ReDim`陳述式。When the option is enabled, all variables must be explicitly declared using a `Dim`, `Private`, `Public`, or `ReDim` statement. 預設值為 `true`。The default is `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定每次批次編譯所產生原始程式檔的最大組合大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum combined size of the generated source files per batched compilation.

value.span: 整數值，表示每次批次編譯所產生原始程式檔的最大組合大小。

span.span: An integer value indicating the maximum combined size of the generated source files per batched compilation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定每次批次編譯所產生的來源檔案的最大大小 （以 kb 為單位）。Specifies the maximum size (in kilobytes) of the generated source files per batched compilation. 預設值為 1000 KB。The default value is 1000 KB. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定可在應用程式重新啟動之前發生的動態資源重新編譯次數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts.

value.span: 值，表示可在應用程式重新啟動之前發生的動態資源重新編譯數目。

span.span: A value indicating the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts.

value.span: 預設值為 15 次重新編譯。

span.span: The default is 15 recompilations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指出資源，可能會發生在應用程式重新啟動之前動態重新編譯數目。Indicates the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts. 在全域和應用程式的組態層級，但不是目錄層級的組態，將支援這個屬性。This attribute is supported at the global and application configuration levels, but not at the directory configuration level. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 會增加每次組件就會失效，無法刪除的屬性值。ASP.NET increases the property value every time an assembly is invalidated and fails to be deleted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/CS/CompilationSection.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/VB/CompilationSection.vb#15)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為，ASP.NET 編譯系統啟用的用意在於提升 ASP.NET 更高的 CPU 使用量的啟動效能的最佳化。When this property is set to , the ASP.NET compilation system enables optimizations that are intended to speed up ASP.NET startup performance at the expense of increased CPU utilization. 這個屬性的預設設定為 。The default setting for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`true`，會發生資料遺失，任何資料型別轉換和數字類型與字串之間的任何轉換，明定不允許編譯。When `true`, compilation explicitly disallows any data-type conversions in which data loss would occur, and any conversion between numeric types and strings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何設定目標.NET Framework 特定版本資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web 專案的.NET Framework 多目標](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b8145a9-62f6-4fc4-8a83-47b0487cbe76)。For information about how to target a specific version of the .NET Framework, see [.NET Framework Multi-Targeting for ASP.NET Web Projects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b8145a9-62f6-4fc4-8a83-47b0487cbe76). ## Examples [compilation 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）compilation Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12)

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示對編譯器的指令使用實體路徑或 URL。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性會指定為`true`在組態中，Url 將會用於編譯器指令，而不是實體路徑。If this property is specified as `true` in the configuration, URLs will be used for the compiler instructions instead of physical paths. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
